▶️ VIEW

introduction

View are provided as examples and are decorreleted from project, in fact when you need to develop a view for your project you can decide to publish it as AGILab view but for this you know some streamlit knowledge. The only link with you project is in app_settings.toml [views] view_module = [<list of view-module>]

[<view_module_xxx>] variables = [ <list of columns names you want to make available in your view_module_xxx>]

Sidebar

This is a listbox to select a project to be loaded from the existing ones.

Main Content Area

Select the View to see for your project. See also EDIT/APP-SETTINGS/File Editor to specify the columns you authorize for a specific view
